sections.heading: Purpose
sections.text: 165.021 Purpose.—The purpose of this act is to provide standards, direction, and procedures for the formation of municipalities in this state and the provision of municipal services so as to:

sections.heading: prohibited from requiring consideration for allowing incorporation.
sections.text: prohibited from requiring consideration for allowing incorporation.

sections.heading: Definitions
sections.text: 165.031 Definitions.—The following terms and phrases, when used in this chapter, shall have the meanings ascribed to them in this section, except where the context clearly indicates a different meaning:

sections.heading: The purpose of this act is to provide standards, direction, and procedures for the formation of municipalities in this state and the provision of municipal services so as to:(1)Allow orderly patterns of urban growth and land use
sections.text: (2)Assure adequate quality and quantity of local public services.(3)Ens

sections.text: 1, Art. VIII of the State Constitutio
